name: nextjs-seo-debugger
description: Inspired by u/JosephDoUrden (https://www.reddit.com/r/nextjs/comments/1qs38nw/). Diagnoses why Google refuses to index Next.js and Vercel sites. Checks redirect chains (301/302/307/308), canonical tag misconfigs, sitemap completeness, robots.txt rules, meta tag validation, and common Vercel/Next.js platform issues. Based on real debugging patterns from production indexing failures.

url.description: URL of the Next.js site to debug (e.g., https://example.com)

follow_redirects.description: Whether to follow and report redirect chains

max_pages.description: Maximum number of internal pages to check (1-50)
